entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
